name: The Highway-Man
raw_snippet: The Highway-Man Motorcycle A fast, rugged vehicle common to the city and flat lands. Comes standard with a laser or heavy machine gun. Vehicle Type: Motorcycle Crew: One rider. Maximum Speed: 180 mph (288 km) Engine: Combustion or electric engine. The Mountaineer A.T.V. Maximum Range: 400 miles (480 km) An extremely popular armored, all terrain vehicle. It has a pilot's Length: 6 feet (1.8 m) compartment that can seat five and a large, enclosed cargo bay Weight: 240 lbs (108 kg) ( 1 0 x 8 x 8 foot cargo area). M.D.C. by Location: Vehicle Type: Three wheeled armored ATV transport vehicle. Tires (2) - 1 each Crew: One pilot and can accommodate four passengers comfortably, Main Body — 75 plus cargo area.
